response.original_title: คาดว่าพรุ่งนี้จะดีขึ้น
response.overview: The Book of Champ, a group of SWU students who have come together, led by Professor Phudit, to apply for a scholarship to make a short film as a teaching aid for the Philosophy students in the Faculty of Humanities. Everything is going well, but suddenly Professor Phudit falls ill and dies suddenly.
response.title: คาดว่าพรุ่งนี้จะดีขึ้น
